content: I completely agree with your statement. prince's music truly empowered and inspired people to be their true selves and embrace their individuality. many other artists have since followed in his footsteps and used their platforms to promote positive change and acceptance, but there is still much work to be done. the music industry has the power to influence hearts and minds, and it's important for artists to use that power to promote inclusion, diversity, and equality. prince's legacy serves as a powerful reminder that artists can make a difference and inspire positive change through their art and message.
